title: KDA skins were copied looks from a very familiar anime/show
body:
KDA Evelyn:       https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IqHbDVyRBD8/maxresdefault.jpg


Yugioh harpy lady: http://www.myfconline.com/character_avatars/9549_26076.jpg
second picture :3: https://orig00.deviantart.net/3d13/f/2015/141/f/8/yugioh_ladys_harpy_by_bluerathy_s-d8u8lb0.png

much originality i guess.
note:they actually do have the same style, also look at her hair and the way she is acting. there is no difference if you look closely :)
